attributes.action: I believe that the TV license should be abolished and paid for from subscription
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the license fee should be abolished and that the money should be either made up from advertising or subscription services such as sky and virgin.
attributes.background: In the uk if you have a tv you have to pay for a license, this license fee is paying only for the bbc  a group of channels that only have a few interesting programs and pays its executives ridiculous amounts of money.
